name: 360MEA Ltd.
description: Developer of a social video mobile application intended to offer a virtual reality-based entertainment experience. The company's application streams live virtual sports, talk shows, music, and events with gyroscope support, enabling users to experience live events and shows in an immersive manner.
one_liner: Developer of a social video mobile application intended to offer a virtual reality-based entertainment experience. The company's application streams live virtual sports, talk shows, music, and events with gyroscope support, enabling users to experience live events and shows in an immersive manner.
